Used to remove players' [[spawn point]]s in the [[world]].

== Syntax ==

: <code>clearspawnpoint [player: target]</code>

== Arguments ==

{{argument|be=1|player: target|CommandSelector<Player>}}
: Specifies the [[player]] whose spawn point should be removed. If not specified, defaults to the command's executor ({{code|@s}}).
: {{arg desc|be=player}}
